items.content_html: This project provides a mock backend API for managing contacts, built using JSON Server. It serves as a simple and lightweight REST API for CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations on contact data.
items.title: roshrengasmy/contactManager-JSONServer: This project provides a mock backend API for managing contacts, built using JSON Server. It serves as a simple and lightweight REST API for CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations on contact data.
